translation.en: [FAA traffic controller] American 11, heavy traffic's orbiting north of the field at 3,500 feet,
translation.it: Volo American 11, traffico intenso a nord dell'area a 3500 piedi.

translation.en: maintain 3,000, runway four right.
translation.it: Mantenersi a quota 3000, pista quattro a destra.

translation.en: Cleared for takeoff.
translation.it: Decollo autorizzato.

translation.en: [woman] What a beautiful, beautiful Tuesday morning it was.
translation.it: Era un bellissimo martedì mattina.

translation.en: The sky was clear, it was blue, not a cloud in the sky.
translation.it: Il cielo era limpido, azzurro, senza nemmeno una nuvola.

translation.en: They call it "severe clear."
translation.it: La visibilità era illimitata.

translation.en: About eight o'clock, American Flight 11 was fully fueled.
translation.it: Verso le otto, il volo American 11 aveva già fatto rifornimento.

translation.en: It was bound for Los Angeles.
translation.it: Era diretto a Los Angeles.

translation.en: It left Boston Logan Airport. We know it was hijacked.
translation.it: Lasciò l'aeroporto Logan di Boston e fu dirottato.

translation.en: [FAA man] American 11, climb maintain level three five zero.
translation.it: Volo American 11, salire a livello 350.

translation.en: American 11, climb maintain level three five zero.
translation.it: Volo American 11, salire a livello 350.

translation.en: American 11, Boston.
translation.it: Volo American 11, qui Boston.

translation.en: [FAA man 2] This is Athens.
translation.it: Qui Athens.

translation.en: [FAA man] This is Boston, I turned American 20 left. I was gonna climb him, he will not respond to me now at all.
translation.it: Qui Boston, ho fatto virare a sinistra il volo 20, ma non risponde.

translation.en: [FAA man 2] Looks like he's turning right.
translation.it: Pare stia virando a destra.

translation.en: [Bouchat] Traffic controllers lost contact,
translation.it: Avevano perso il contatto,

translation.en: but the hijackers used the Hudson River as its guide down to New York City.
translation.it: ma i dirottatori usarono l'Hudson come guida per entrare a New York.

translation.en: [Ong] Number Three in the back. The cockpit's not answering.
translation.it: Numero tre in fondo. La cabina non risponde.

translation.en: Somebody's stabbed in business class.
translation.it: Accoltellamento in business.

translation.en: And I think there's Mace that we can't breathe.
translation.it: E l'aria è irrespirabile per i lacrimogeni.

translation.en: I don't know. I think we're getting hijacked.
translation.it: Non so. Credo che ci stiano dirottando.

translation.en: [man] What is your name?
translation.it: Come si chiama?

translation.en: [Ong] Okay. My name is Betty Ong.
translation.it: Mi chiamo Betty Ong.

translation.en: I'm Number Three on Flight 11.
translation.it: Assistente tre sul volo 11.

translation.en: Our first class passengers are--
translation.it: I passeggeri di prima…

translation.en: Our first class galley flight attendant, and our purser has been stabbed.
translation.it: Hanno accoltellato l'assistente di prima classe e il commissario di bordo.

translation.en: And we can't get to the cockpit, the door won't open.
translation.it: E la porta della cabina non si apre.

translation.en: [woman] Have you guys called anyone else?
translation.it: Avete chiamato qualcun altro?

translation.en: [Ong] No. Somebody's calling medical and we can't get a doc--
translation.it: No. Stanno chiamando l'infermeria, ma nessun dott…

translation.en: In 2001, I was working in the World Trade Center
translation.it: Nel 2001, lavoravo al World Trade Center

translation.en: in the South Tower, Tower 2.
translation.it: nella Torre Sud, la Torre Due.

translation.en: I was located on the 101st.
translation.it: L'ufficio era al 101° piano.

translation.en: We were there about four or five years, I think, in that building.
translation.it: Eravamo lì da quattro o cinque anni, credo.

translation.en: I started working at the hotel in 1981.
translation.it: Avevo iniziato a lavorare nell'hotel nel 1981.

translation.en: It was called Vista International and then it became Marriott International Hotel.
translation.it: Il vecchio Vista International era diventato Marriot International Hotel.

translation.en: I was hotel engineer. Basically maintained the whole building.
translation.it: Ero il tecnico addetto alla manutenzione di tutto l'edificio.

translation.en: And on the morning of September 11, I arrived there about six o'clock, as I usually do.
translation.it: La mattina dell'11 settembre, arrivai alle sei come al solito.

translation.en: Usually about eight o'clock, we have departmental meetings,
translation.it: Alle otto, c'erano le riunioni di reparto,

translation.en: which is a brief meeting of what's going to be on the agenda for the day.
translation.it: dei brevi incontri per decidere l'agenda della giornata.

translation.en: And for this particular meeting, my boss told us
translation.it: In questa riunione particolare, il mio capo ci disse

translation.en: that there were some guests that was staying at the hotel, and they had some issues with their room.
translation.it: che alcune ospiti dell'hotel avevano dei problemi con la stanza.

translation.en: My boss wanted us to really focus on these two guests.
translation.it: Ci chiese quindi di concentrarci su quelle due ospiti.

translation.en: The two ladies, their names were Faye and Leigh Gilmore, from Chicago.
translation.it: Si trattava di due signore, Faye e Leigh Gilmore, di Chicago.

translation.en: Leigh had MS. It was very crippling to her.
translation.it: Leigh aveva la sclerosi multipla ed era molto impedita.

translation.en: That confined her to a wheelchair.
translation.it: Era su una sedia a rotelle.

translation.en: [Frederick] She advocated for people who had disabilities.
translation.it: Si batteva per le persone con disabilità.

translation.en: And I told my boss that I would go to the room
translation.it: Dissi al capo che sarei andato in camera sua

translation.en: and make sure that the guest was happy and make sure the guest had everything they needed for that day.
translation.it: per controllare che fosse soddisfatta e avesse tutto il necessario.

translation.en: [man] American Airlines Emergency line, please state your emergency.
translation.it: Linea di emergenza dell'American Airlines. Mi dica.

translation.en: [woman] Hey. This is Nydia at American Airlines calling.
translation.it: Sono Nydia dell'American Airlines.

translation.en: I am monitoring a call in which Flight 11,
translation.it: Sto monitorando una chiamata dal volo 11.

translation.en: the flight attendant is advising our reps that the pilot, everyone's been stabbed.
translation.it: L'assistente di volo ci ha avvisati che il pilota è stato accoltellato.

translation.en: -[operator] Flight 11? -[woman] Yeah.
translation.it: - Volo 11? - Sì.

translation.en: [operator] Uh, we contacted Air Traffic Control.
translation.it: Abbiamo contattato l'ATC.

translation.en: They are going to handle this as a confirmed hijacking,
translation.it: Lo tratteranno come un dirottamento confermato

translation.en: so they're moving all traffic out of this aircraft's way.
translation.it: e sposteranno tutto il traffico.

translation.en: [woman] Okay.
translation.it: Ok.

translation.en: [operator] He turned his transponder off, so we don't have a definitive altitude for him.
translation.it: Ha spento il transponder, quindi non ne conosciamo l'altitudine.

translation.en: Uh, we're just going by-- They seem to think that--
translation.it: Seguiamo solo… Sembra che pensino…

translation.en: They have him on a primary radar. They seem to think that he is descending.
translation.it: Lo vedono su un radar primario. Pare stia scendendo.

translation.en: [woman] I entered the lobby,
translation.it: Entrai nell'atrio.

translation.en: and to get to my 82nd floor, I had to take two elevators.
translation.it: Per arrivare all'82° piano, dove lavoravo, dovevo prendere due ascensori.

translation.en: So, first was the express elevator to 78th floor, and then to 82nd.
translation.it: Prima quello rapido, fino al 78° piano, e poi quello per l'82°.

translation.en: And I came to my office
translation.it: Arrivai nel mio ufficio,

translation.en: and I was so lucky, because I had my desk just by the window
translation.it: dove avevo la fortuna di avere la scrivania vicino alla finestra

translation.en: on the east side of the tower.
translation.it: sul lato est della torre.

translation.en: So I saw from my window the East River, all bridges,
translation.it: Dalla mia finestra vedevo l'East River, tutti i ponti

translation.en: and far, far away, towards Europe.
translation.it: e guardavo in lontananza verso l'Europa.

translation.en: The Division Chief was my title in the Law Department
translation.it: Ero capo divisione dell'ufficio legale

translation.en: of the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey.
translation.it: dell'Autorità Portuale di NY e NJ.

translation.en: And the Trade Center was built in the mid-late '60s, early '70s
translation.it: Il Trade Center fu costruito tra la metà degli anni '60 e l'inizio degli anni '70

translation.en: by the Port Authority, and so when it was finished,
translation.it: dall'Autorità Portuale che,

translation.en: they put their headquarters there.
translation.it: una volta finito, ci mise la sede.

translation.en: It was a Japanese man who was the main architect. Ironically, he was afraid of heights.
translation.it: Fu progettato da un giapponese che, paradossalmente, soffriva di vertigini.

translation.en: And yet he built these two behemoth buildings.
translation.it: Eppure costruì questi due edifici colossali.

translation.en: The power brokers in New York wanted to build this center
translation.it: I power broker, fra cui i Rockfeller,

translation.en: for commerce and world trade, including the Rockefellers.
translation.it: volevano un centro dedicato al commercio mondiale

translation.en: So they came up with the "World Trade Center."
translation.it: e quindi lo chiamarono "World Trade Center".

translation.en: When they were first built, architecture critics didn't like them.
translation.it: Le torri però non piacquero ai critici.

translation.en: Common joke was,
translation.it: La battuta più ricorrente era:

translation.en: "Welcome to New York, home of famous buildings,
translation.it: "Benvenuti a New York, coi suoi bellissimi edifici

translation.en: beautiful buildings, like the Empire State Building
translation.it: "Benvenuti a New York, coi suoi bellissimi edifici come l'Empire State, il Chrysler

translation.en: and the Chrysler Building, and the boxes they came in."
translation.it: come l'Empire State, il Chrysler e le scatole che li contenevano".

translation.en: But they grew on people, so to speak, and they were much beloved.
translation.it: Ma poi la gente iniziò ad apprezzarle e ad amarle molto.

translation.en: On a given Monday through Friday,
translation.it: Dal lunedì al venerdì,

translation.en: you might have 70, 80 thousand people just in that little 16-acre spot.
translation.it: in questo spazio di 65.000 mq, potevano passare 70-80.000 persone.

translation.en: So it was kind of like a city within a city.
translation.it: Era una sorta di città nella città.

translation.en: [man] I was the assistant commissioner at the New York City Department of Investigation.
translation.it: Ero vice commissario al Dipartimento Investigativo di New York.

translation.en: We were doing an operation on the day of the attack. We were at the World Trade Center meeting up with,
translation.it: Quel giorno eravamo al World Trade Center per incontrare

translation.en: basically a bad guy to take a bribe who didn't want to pay his taxes.
translation.it: un evasore fiscale che ci offriva una mazzetta.

translation.en: We had a team of investigators who were wired up, and they were gonna meet him there.
translation.it: Una squadra di agenti microfonati lo avrebbe incontrato lì.

translation.en: [Boston FAA] Is that American 11 trying to call?
translation.it: L'American 11 sta chiamando?

translation.en: [man] Put that phone up on that HAM--
translation.it: Sintonizza il telefono su…

translation.en: [Atta] We have some planes. Just stay quiet and we'll be okay.
translation.it: Abbiamo preso degli aerei. Calma, andrà tutto bene.

translation.en: We're returning to the airport.
translation.it: Torniamo all'aeroporto.

translation.en: [Boston FAA] American 11, are you trying to call?
translation.it: American 11, state chiamando?

translation.en: [Atta] Nobody move. Everything will be okay.
translation.it: Nessuno si muova. Andrà tutto bene.

translation.en: If you try to make any moves, you will endanger yourself and the airplane.
translation.it: Qualsiasi mossa potrà nuocere a voi e all'aereo.

translation.en: Just stay quiet.
translation.it: Non vi agitate.

translation.en: [man] Hi, Boston Center, T.M.U. We have a problem here.
translation.it: Unità traffico aereo di Boston. C'è un problema.

translation.en: We have a hijacked aircraft headed towards New York,
translation.it: C'è un aereo dirottato diretto a New York

translation.en: and we need you guys to--
translation.it: e abbiamo bisogno che…

translation.en: We need someone to scramble some F-16s or something up there to help us out.
translation.it: Dovete far decollare degli F-16 per aiutarci.

translation.en: [Powell] Is this real-world or exercise?
translation.it: È un'esercitazione?

translation.en: [Boston ATC] No. This is not an exercise, not a test.
translation.it: No. Non è un'esercitazione.

translation.en: [Powell] Okay. Hey, uh, hold on one second. Okay?
translation.it: Ok. Ehi! Aspetti un attimo, ok?

translation.en: [Boston ATC] Yes.
translation.it: Sì.

translation.en: [Powell] Hey, hey, hey, hey.
translation.it: Ehi!

translation.en: -Hey, seriously. Big time. -[man] What?
translation.it: - Cavolo, è roba grossa. - Come?

translation.en: [woman] What?
translation.it: Cosa?

translation.en: -[people exclaim] -What was that?
translation.it: Cos'era quello?

translation.en: [woman 2] Is that real-world? Real-world hijacking.
translation.it: Ma davvero? Un dirottamento vero?

translation.en: [Glogowski] Quarter to nine in my office, there was absolute silence.
translation.it: Alle nove meno un quarto, nel mio ufficio regnava il silenzio.

translation.en: Everybody was working on their machines.
translation.it: Tutti lavoravano alle loro macchine.

translation.en: And all of a sudden,
translation.it: E, all'improvviso,

translation.en: the silence was broken by tremendous blast.
translation.it: il silenzio fu interrotto da uno scoppio terribile.

translation.en: [man] And can I get your autograph also?
translation.it: Mi fai un autografo anche tu?

translation.en: [man 1] What the hell was that?
translation.it: Che cavolo succede?

translation.en: [man 2] Sounded like a plane crash.
translation.it: Sembra uno schianto aereo.

translation.en: -Yo! Close to ya. -[man 1] Come to us! Come to us! Come to us!
translation.it: - Ehi! Di qua. - Vieni da noi!

translation.en: Come to us!
translation.it: Da questa parte!

translation.en: Hey, Beth! What is that?
translation.it: Ehi, Beth. Che succede?

translation.en: Something-- Somebody hit the World Trade Center? Or the--
translation.it: Qualcuno ha colpito il World Trade Center?

translation.en: [man 1] It's the Trade Center. Trade Center.
translation.it: È il Trade Center.

translation.en: [man 3] Holy shit!
translation.it: Porca puttana!

translation.en: Shit!
translation.it: Cazzo!

translation.en: [reporter 1] This just in, you are looking at,
translation.it: Queste immagini appena arrivate

translation.en: obviously, a very disturbing live shot there.
translation.it: sono, ovviamente, molto inquietanti.

translation.en: That is the World Trade Center, and we have unconfirmed reports this morning
translation.it: Questo è il World Trade Center e ci sono voci non confermate

translation.en: that a plane has crashed into one of the towers.
translation.it: di uno schianto aereo su una delle torri.

translation.en: [reporter 2] We're looking--
translation.it: Davanti a noi…

translation.en: There's no doubt there was a huge explosion and fire.
translation.it: C'è stata un'esplosione e un incendio.

translation.en: Lots of black smoke coming from that building.
translation.it: Dall'edificio sale un sacco di fumo nero.

translation.en: Black smoke, again, would indicate that the fire is nowhere near under control.
translation.it: Quel fumo nero indica che l'incendio è tutt'altro che sotto controllo.

translation.en: [Kern] I was up in my office, at that point, on the 62nd floor.
translation.it: Ero nel mio ufficio, al 62° piano.

translation.en: At 8:46, there was suddenly a loud bang and a crash,
translation.it: Alle 8:46 sentimmo uno scoppio e uno schianto improvvisi

translation.en: and the building started shaking, which I had never felt before.
translation.it: e l'edificio iniziò a tremare come non avevo mai sentito.

translation.en: Now, the engineers tell me the buildings were designed to sway in the wind in hurricane-force winds.
translation.it: Gli edifici erano stati progettati per oscillare al vento degli uragani.

translation.en: They had to. They couldn't be rigid, because they were too tall.
translation.it: Erano troppo alti per essere rigidi.

translation.en: But this was different, this was like shaking so much so
translation.it: Ma stavolta era diverso, tremava così tanto

translation.en: that a couple of my co-workers lost their footing
translation.it: Ma stavolta era diverso, tremava così tanto che un paio di colleghi persero l'equilibrio e caddero in ginocchio.

translation.en: and, like, fell to their knees.
translation.it: che un paio di colleghi persero l'equilibrio e caddero in ginocchio.

translation.en: And the shaking seemed to go on for, like, 20 or 30 seconds.
translation.it: E quel tremore continuò per 20-30 secondi.

translation.en: When the shaking stopped,
translation.it: Quando finalmente finì,

translation.en: I yelled to everybody to get out and head for the stairs.
translation.it: urlai a tutti di uscire e andare verso le scale.

translation.en: Don't waste time waiting to find out what happened.
translation.it: Non perdete tempo a capire cosa sia successo.

translation.en: Get out first, find out later.
translation.it: Prima uscite e poi lo scoprirete.

translation.en: [reporter] Thousands, tens of thousands of people actually work inside those two buildings
translation.it: Decine di migliaia di persone lavorano in quei due edifici

translation.en: in the heart of New York's Financial District.
translation.it: nel distretto finanziario di New York.

translation.en: [Bouchat] I sat on the south side of the South Tower,
translation.it: Mi trovavo sul lato sud della Torre Sud

translation.en: I was as far away as you could be, and I heard boom.
translation.it: e, nonostante la lontananza, udii un botto.

translation.en: It was a very faint boom.
translation.it: Fu un botto molto tenue.

translation.en: My co-workers who sat on the west and the north side of the building
translation.it: I colleghi che lavoravano sui lati ovest e nord

translation.en: actually felt the heat of the airplane parts as they went past their windows,
translation.it: sentirono il calore dei pezzi dell'aereo che passavano davanti alle finestre

translation.en: and they said paper on their desk became charred.
translation.it: carbonizzando i fogli sulle scrivanie.

translation.en: [interviewer] Did you have any desire, at that point, to evacuate?
translation.it: A quel punto ebbe il desiderio di uscire?

translation.en: No. Thought hadn't entered my head. In fact, my mother asked me, "Are you leaving?"
translation.it: No. Non ci pensai proprio. Mia madre mi chiese: "Stai uscendo?"

translation.en: Because Mom is asking, I said, "Sure."
translation.it: E io dissi di sì per lei.

translation.en: [Green] We all thought that basically it was some knucklehead who's driving some Cessna or some little thing
translation.it: Pensammo tutti a qualche idiota su un Cessna o un velivolo leggero

translation.en: who just went out of the way and hit the building.
translation.it: che aveva perso il controllo.

translation.en: We didn't realize at first that it was a 757.
translation.it: All'inizio non capimmo che era un 757.

translation.en: [Bouchat] I was packing my bag, and I noticed Jim Berger walk past,
translation.it: Mentre raccoglievo le mie cose, vidi passare Jim Berger.

translation.en: and he had earlier heard me say that a bomb had gone off,
translation.it: Prima mi aveva sentito dire che era esplosa una bomba

translation.en: and he came by to tell us that he had heard
translation.it: ed era venuto a dirci di aver saputo

translation.en: that it was actually a plane that had gone into the North Tower.
translation.it: che, in realtà, un aereo era entrato nella Torre Nord.

translation.en: Tower One.
translation.it: La Torre Uno.

translation.en: It went into the core of the building, straight in.
translation.it: L'aveva proprio sfondata,

translation.en: So if you were at the 92nd floor or above, there was no escape,
translation.it: quindi, dal 92° piano in su, non c'era via di fuga,

translation.en: there were no stairs to come down.
translation.it: non c'erano scale.

translation.en: [firefighter] Fire Department 408. Where's the fire?
translation.it: Caserma 408. Dov'è l'incendio?

translation.en: [man] Yeah. Hi. I'm on the 106th floor of the World Trade Center.
translation.it: Salve, sono al 106° piano del World Trade Center.

translation.en: We just had an explosion up here. [firefighter] Okay. 106th floor?
translation.it: - C'è stata un'esplosione. - Ok. Ha detto 106° piano?

translation.en: -What building? One or Two? -[man] That's One World Trade.
translation.it: - Torre Uno o Due? - Torre Uno.

translation.en: [firefighter] Keep the windows open if you can and just sit tight.
translation.it: Ok. Se potete, lasciate le finestre aperte.

translation.en: It's gonna be a while because there's a fire downstairs.
translation.it: Ci vorrà un po'. C'è un incendio sotto.

translation.en: [man] We can't open the windows unless we break them.
translation.it: Le finestre non sono apribili.

translation.en: [firefighter] Okay. Just sit tight.
translation.it: Ok. Tenete duro.

translation.en: All right. Just sit tight. We're on the way.
translation.it: Tenete duro. Stiamo arrivando.

translation.en: [man] All right. Please hurry.
translation.it: Ok. Sbrigatevi.

translation.en: [Bouchat] And what had started as a beautiful, beautiful day was now turning brown.
translation.it: Quella bellissima giornata stava diventando cupa.

translation.en: There was paper swirling outside our window.
translation.it: I fogli volavano fuori dalle finestre.

translation.en: And at that point it's when Jim said, "Time to go home."
translation.it: A quel punto Jim disse: "È ora di tornare a casa".

translation.en: And we thought, "This is great. It's not even 9:00 a.m.
translation.it: E noi pensammo: "Non sono nemmeno le 9:00

translation.en: and we were headed home."
translation.it: e andiamo a casa".

translation.en: As I headed to the elevators, Jim went down the corridor.
translation.it: Mentre andavo agli ascensori, Jim percorse il corridoio

translation.en: He was doing another sweep of the floor.
translation.it: per fare una ricognizione.

translation.en: He went to make sure everybody knew that it was time to go and there was nobody left.
translation.it: Voleva dire a tutti che era ora di andare e non c'era più nessuno.

translation.en: Jim did not make it out.
translation.it: Jim non ce la fece.

translation.en: [reporter] At this point, we do not have official injury updates to bring you.
translation.it: Al momento non possiamo darvi nessun aggiornamento sui feriti.

translation.en: We are only now beginning to put together the pieces of this horrible incident.
translation.it: Stiamo solo iniziando a mettere insieme i pezzi di questo terribile incidente.

translation.en: [Frederick] The building shook.
translation.it: L'edificio tremò.

translation.en: So we didn't know what that was.
translation.it: Non sapevamo il motivo.

translation.en: Automatically, the alarms went off. And when the alarms go off, all the elevators, everything is disabled.
translation.it: Gli allarmi si attivarono automaticamente bloccando gli ascensori e tutto il resto.

translation.en: We knew it was bad. We knew something was wrong.
translation.it: Sapevamo che la situazione era grave.

translation.en: So as I stood in the lobby, I noticed a lady coming toward me.
translation.it: Mentre ero nell'atrio, notai una signora che veniva verso di me.

translation.en: She came from the Twin Towers.
translation.it: Veniva dalle Torri Gemelle.

translation.en: And she was very, very badly burned, and I said, "Oh my God."
translation.it: Aveva ustioni molto gravi e io dissi: "Oddio".

translation.en: Somebody yelled, screamed to get a towel to cover her up
translation.it: Qualcuno urlò di prendere un asciugamano per coprirla

translation.en: because her skin was, like, really peeling bad.
translation.it: perché la sua pelle si stava staccando.

translation.en: And I found out later that she was burned from the fuel.
translation.it: Poi seppi che era per via del carburante.

translation.en: [interviewer] Must've come down the elevator shaft. Elevators. Yes.
translation.it: - Sarà sceso dal vano ascensore. - Sì. Esatto.

translation.en: For some reason, the ladies popped into my head, and I said to myself,
translation.it: Mi tornarono in mente le due signore e mi dissi:

translation.en: "You know, maybe I should go and see if they're up there,
translation.it: Mi tornarono in mente le due signore e mi dissi: "Forse dovrei andare a vedere se sono lassù, perché non lo so".

translation.en: 'cause I'm not sure."
translation.it: "Forse dovrei andare a vedere se sono lassù, perché non lo so".

translation.en: Being that the elevator's disabled,
translation.it: L'ascensore non funzionava,

translation.en: I went to the freight elevator, got on, used the key, went upstairs.
translation.it: quindi salii sul montacarichi, lo azionai con la chiave e salii.

translation.en: As I open the door, they were there. Three ladies waiting.
translation.it: Quando aprii la porta, le trovai lì. Tre signore in attesa.

translation.en: They were stuck up there.
translation.it: Erano bloccate lassù.

translation.en: One of the ladies, she bolted and ran back in her room and locked the door.
translation.it: Una delle signore tornò in camera e chiuse la porta.

translation.en: -[interviewer] She was scared. -Scared. Yeah.
translation.it: - Non so perché. - Paura.

translation.en: So I ran after her and I banged on the door and I told her,
translation.it: La inseguii, bussai alla porta e le dissi:

translation.en: "Excuse me, miss. I don't know what's going on."
translation.it: "Non so cosa stia succedendo.

translation.en: "I know it's something bad. I don't know. I'm scared myself."
translation.it: So che è grave e ho paura anch'io.

translation.en: "We got to leave."
translation.it: Dobbiamo andarcene".

translation.en: She started crying. She told me, "Okay. I'll come with you."
translation.it: Iniziò a piangere e disse: "Ok, la seguo".

translation.en: [interviewer] You eventually-- You got them to safety.
translation.it: Alla fine le portò in salvo.

translation.en: From there, did you know what happened to them?
translation.it: Ha poi saputo cosa ne è stato di loro?

translation.en: No. I did not.
translation.it: No.

translation.en: [reporter 1] Planes, typically, are not that close to these buildings.
translation.it: Gli aerei non si avvicinano mai a questi edifici.

translation.en: Wind speeds at this point, not tremendous at all.
translation.it: La velocità del vento era tutt'altro che terribile.

translation.en: -Flying conditions, near perfect. -[reporter 2] Picture-perfect.
translation.it: - E le condizioni perfette. - Esatto.

translation.en: [Kern] There were already people pouring in
translation.it: Molte persone erano scese

translation.en: from every floor above us into the stairwells.
translation.it: Molte persone erano scese da tutti i piani.

translation.en: I decided I was going to stand at the entrance and count the people from my division
translation.it: Io decisi di mettermi all'ingresso e contare le persone del mio reparto

translation.en: and make sure all nine got into the stairwell.
translation.it: per assicurarmi che scendessero.

translation.en: I was the Division Chief, so I felt they were my responsibility.
translation.it: Ero il capo reparto e mi sentivo responsabile.

translation.en: And the stairs were very crowded, so they weren't moving fast at all.
translation.it: Le scale erano affollatissime, quindi procedevano piano.

translation.en: At the 20th floor…
translation.it: Al 20° piano,

translation.en: is where we first saw a firefighter going up as we were going down.
translation.it: trovammo il primo pompiere che saliva mentre noi scendevamo.

translation.en: That meant the rest of the trip we had to go single file,
translation.it: Dovevamo quindi procedere in fila indiana,

translation.en: because now Port Authority police and firefighters
translation.it: perché la polizia dell'Autorità Portuale e i pompieri

translation.en: were coming up the other side to try and get the building evacuated.
translation.it: stavano salendo in senso opposto per evacuare l'edificio.

translation.en: I was glad to see the firefighters.
translation.it: Fui contento di vederli.

translation.en: [man] This is Central. Be advised, from our location I see heavy smoke
translation.it: VOCE POMPIERE Attenzione, dalla nostra posizione rilevo molto fumo

translation.en: coming from the building of the World Trade Center.
translation.it: proveniente dal World Trade Center.

translation.en: Send me just about anything that you got in this direction, Kate.
translation.it: Manda tutti i rinforzi possibili, Kate.

translation.en: [man] The morning of September 11th, I wasn't actually supposed to be on duty.
translation.it: La mattina dell'11 settembre non dovevo essere in servizio.

translation.en: I had worked a 24-hour shift Sunday night,
translation.it: Avevo appena finito un turno di 24 ore da domenica sera

translation.en: Monday day, September 11th being Tuesday.
translation.it: a tutto il lunedì. L'11 era appunto martedì.

translation.en: The captain of Engine 24, he had asked me to pick up the shift for him.
translation.it: Il capitano dell'autopompa 24 mi aveva chiesto di sostituirlo.

translation.en: The lobby glass was broken.
translation.it: Il vetro dell'atrio era rotto. Quando entrammo,

translation.en: We walked in and we could see cracks in the marble,
translation.it: Il vetro dell'atrio era rotto. Quando entrammo, vedemmo delle crepe nel marmo

translation.en: and I could see some dead bodies near the elevators.
translation.it: e io vidi dei cadaveri vicino agli ascensori

translation.en: This was the jet fuel that had come down the elevator shafts.
translation.it: a causa del carburante che era sceso dai vani ascensore.

translation.en: The order was, basically, we were gonna have to walk up and fight this fire and get as many people as we can.
translation.it: L'ordine era di domare le fiamme e portare via più persone possibili.

translation.en: And we started going up single file.
translation.it: Iniziammo a salire in fila indiana

translation.en: And we had lots of civilians coming down single file, very orderly.
translation.it: e incontrammo molti civili che scendevano in modo molto ordinato.

translation.en: Eventually we got a guy from the 90th floor that had seen fire.
translation.it: Alla fine trovammo un uomo del 92° piano che aveva visto il fuoco.

translation.en: So, that's when I knew we had a very long climb to go.
translation.it: Fu allora che capii che dovevamo ancora salire molto.

translation.en: [Bouchat] I made it very quickly down to the 78th floor Sky Lobby.
translation.it: TORRE SUD Scesi subito alla Sky Lobby del 78° piano.

translation.en: It was packed with people.
translation.it: Era piena di gente.

translation.en: About 400 were waiting on that lobby to catch the express elevator to the bottom.
translation.it: C'erano circa 400 persone in attesa dell'ascensore rapido per scendere giù.

translation.en: I believe I got into one of the last elevators that made it to the lobby level.
translation.it: Io presi uno degli ultimi ascensori che arrivarono nell'atrio.

translation.en: [reporter] It's obviously-- Something devastating has happened.
translation.it: È evidente che sia successo qualcosa di devastante.

translation.en: And again, unconfirmed report
translation.it: Continua a girare la voce

translation.en: that a plane has crashed into one of the towers there. We are efforting…
translation.it: di un aereo finito contro una torre. Ci sforziamo…

translation.en: -[man 1] Can you look out your window? -[man 2] Yeah.
translation.it: - Può guardare dalla finestra? - Sì.

translation.en: [man 1] Can you see a guy at 4,000 feet, about five east of the airport? Looks like he's…
translation.it: Vede un aereo a 4000 piedi e cinque miglia a est dell'aeroporto?

translation.en: [man 2] Yeah. I see him.
translation.it: Sì. Lo vedo.

translation.en: [man 1] Is he descending to the building also?
translation.it: Sta scendendo sull'edificio?

translation.en: -[man 2] He's descending really quick too. -[man 1] Well, that's…
translation.it: - Sì, scende molto rapidamente. - Beh, è…

translation.en: [man 2] 4,500 feet, now. He just dropped 800 feet in, like, one sweep.
translation.it: Ora è a 4500 piedi. È sceso di 800 piedi in un colpo solo.

translation.en: [man 1] That's another situation.
translation.it: Ce n'è un altro.

translation.en: [Bouchat] We came up to street level, and I was with three of my co-workers.
translation.it: Arrivai in strada con tre colleghi.

translation.en: We found each other on the elevator. And as we stepped off onto Liberty Street…
translation.it: Ci eravamo ritrovati in ascensore e, arrivati in Liberty Street,

translation.en: we took about ten steps and Ingrid yelled, "Run."
translation.it: dopo una decina di passi Ingrid urlò: "Correte".

translation.en: She doesn't remember why she said it, but we ran down Liberty Street
translation.it: Non ricorda perché, ma corremmo per Liberty Street verso Church Street, a Zuccotti Park.

translation.en: towards Church Street in Zuccotti Park.
translation.it: ma corremmo per Liberty Street verso Church Street, a Zuccotti Park.

translation.en: And the time was 9:03.
translation.it: Erano le 9:03.

translation.en: I know that now, because at 9:03 is when United 175 crashed into the South Tower.
translation.it: Lo so per certo, perché fu l'ora dello schianto dell'United 175 sulla Torre Sud.

translation.en: [Dries] Oh my God!
translation.it: Oddio!

translation.en: Oh my God!
translation.it: Mio Dio!

translation.en: [reporter 1] Oh my goodness. There's another one.
translation.it: - Santo cielo, ce n'è un altro. - Oddio.

translation.en: Oh my goodness. There's another one.
translation.it: Santo cielo, ce n'è un altro.

translation.en: [reporter 2] This seems to be on purpose.
translation.it: Stavolta sembra intenzionale.

translation.en: -[man 1] Another one hit the building. -[man 2] Wow.
translation.it: - Un altro aereo sull'edificio. - Wow.

translation.en: -[man 1] Another one just hit it hard. -[man 2] Another one hit the World Trade.
translation.it: - Un altro schianto. - Un altro aereo sul WTC.

translation.en: -[man 1] The whole building came apart. -[man 2] Holy smokes.
translation.it: - L'edificio è distrutto. - Santo cielo. NASTRO AMATORIALE

translation.en: Come on! Come on!
translation.it: Forza!

translation.en: Are you with me, John?
translation.it: Ci sei, John?

translation.en: [man] I don't know.
translation.it: Non lo so.

translation.en: [woman] Get down, everybody! Get down!
translation.it: State giù!

translation.en: -[man 1] What happened? -[man 2] What's happening?
translation.it: - Cos'è successo? - Che succede?

translation.en: [woman] Waiting for another explosion!
translation.it: …aspetto un'altra esplosione!

translation.en: [man 1] Get back!
translation.it: Indietro!

translation.en: [man 2] Let's just get back.
translation.it: Torniamo indietro.

translation.en: [officer 1] Come on! Let's move! -Let's move! Let's go! Move it! -[officer 2] Come on! Move it! Come on!
translation.it: Forza! Muoviamoci! Andiamo, su! Forza!

translation.en: [firefighter 1] Second plane just--
translation.it: Un secondo aereo…

translation.en: [firefighter 2] DC01, go.
translation.it: DC01, vai.

translation.en: [firefighter 1] Second explosion in Number Two World Trade Center on the upper floors.
translation.it: Seconda esplosione nel secondo edificio del WTC.

translation.en: It's Number Two World Trade Center, explosion on the upper floors.
translation.it: Un'esplosione nella parte alta della Torre Due.

translation.en: [reporter] Now it's obvious, I think,
translation.it: Credo che sia ormai evidente

translation.en: that there's a second plane just crashed into the World Trade Center.
translation.it: che un secondo aereo si è schiantato contro il World Trade Center.

translation.en: I think we have a terrorist act of proportions that we cannot begin to imagine at this juncture.
translation.it: Credo si tratti di un attentato di proporzioni inimmaginabili al momento.

translation.en: [Kern] You could hear people gasping.
translation.it: Si sentiva la gente ansimare.

translation.en: It just felt like the world was falling apart.
translation.it: Sembrava che stesse crollando il mondo.

translation.en: [Bouchat] Your brain is just trying to make some sense of something that was-- made no sense.
translation.it: Il cervello cerca di dare un senso a ciò che non ce l'ha.

translation.en: It was so unbelievable.
translation.it: Era incredibile.

translation.en: [Kern] And that was just the beginning.
translation.it: Ed era solo l'inizio.

translation.en: [air traffic controller] Third aircraft hijack, heading towards Washington.
translation.it: Terzo aereo dirottato diretto a Washington.

translation.en: Scramble Langley, head them towards the Washington area.
translation.it: Langley deve inviare velivoli nell'area di Washington.

translation.en: [man] The September 11, 2001 attacks
translation.it: Gli attacchi dell'11 settembre

translation.en: were the most consequential terrorist attacks in the history of mankind.
translation.it: sono stati i più rilevanti della storia dell'umanità.

translation.en: It's hard, I think, to reimagine the sense of profound upheaval…
translation.it: Penso sia difficile ripensare al senso di profondo sconvolgimento,

translation.en: dislocation, chaos, uncertainty that existed on September 11th
translation.it: scompiglio, caos e incertezza che si venne a creare l'11 settembre

translation.en: in the hours after the attacks.
translation.it: subito dopo gli attacchi.

translation.en: I mean, no one knew who had attacked us, why they had attacked us,
translation.it: Nessuno sapeva chi ci avesse attaccati, perché l'avesse fatto

translation.en: or what attacks were coming next.
translation.it: o quali altri attacchi ci sarebbero stati.

translation.en: And this led to perhaps the main question of that era,
translation.it: E questo portò a porsi la domanda più importante di quell'epoca:

translation.en: which was, "Why do they hate us?"
translation.it: "Perché ci odiano?"

translation.en: The attacks on the Twin Towers were just an opening salvo
translation.it: Gli attacchi alle Torri Gemelle furono solo il primo atto

translation.en: in a sustained day of attacks against targets
translation.it: di una giornata di attacchi a obiettivi

translation.en: representing the symbols of American power.
translation.it: che rappresentavano i simboli del potere americano.

translation.en: It was an operation carried out by acolytes or followers of Osama bin Laden.
translation.it: Fu un'operazione compiuta da accoliti o seguaci di Osama Bin Laden

translation.en: Terrorism, I think, can best be defined as violence or the threat of violence
translation.it: Il terrorismo può essere meglio definito come violenza o minaccia di violenza

translation.en: designed to achieve fundamental political change.
translation.it: volta a provocare cambiamenti politici radicali.

translation.en: All terrorists see themselves as reluctant warriors
translation.it: Tutti i terroristi si vedono come guerrieri riluttanti che si difendono

translation.en: cast on the defensive against predatory aggressors.
translation.it: Tutti i terroristi si vedono come guerrieri riluttanti che si difendono da avidi aggressori.

translation.en: So they feel they have no choice but to use violence.
translation.it: Quindi pensano di poter solo usare la violenza.

translation.en: That was precisely bin Laden's conceit, that terrorism could change the course of history.
translation.it: L'idea di Bin Laden era che il terrorismo avrebbe cambiato il corso della storia.

translation.en: But the path to 9/11 began decades before,
translation.it: Ma la strada verso l'11 settembre era iniziata decenni prima, in piena guerra fredda,

translation.en: really, at the heart of the Cold War
translation.it: decenni prima, in piena guerra fredda,

translation.en: with the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan in 1979.
translation.it: con l'invasione sovietica dell'Afghanistan del 1979.

translation.en: That's really where it all started.
translation.it: Iniziò tutto da lì.

translation.en: I don't think anyone fully understood
translation.it: Credo che nessuno abbia capito davvero

translation.en: that this was a remarkable turning point in history.
translation.it: che quello è stato un punto di svolta nella storia.

translation.en: And no one could have ever foreseen that this would become such a pivotal event
translation.it: E nessuno avrebbe mai potuto prevedere che sarebbe diventato cruciale

translation.en: that would have such an effect, not only on the rest of the 20th century,
translation.it: e che non avrebbe condizionato solo il resto del 20° secolo,

translation.en: but would determine the course of at least the opening decades
translation.it: ma avrebbe determinato il corso dei primi decenni

translation.en: of the 21st century as well.
translation.it: del 21° secolo.

translation.en: [reporter 1] Soviet troops fought pitched battles in the streets of Kabul,
translation.it: I sovietici hanno combattuto una battaglia campale a Kabul,

translation.en: the capital of Afghanistan, today.
translation.it: la capitale dell'Afghanistan.

translation.en: [reporter 2] The Soviet Union has sent tanks and helicopter gunships to help crush the Muslim rebels.
translation.it: L'URSS ha inviato carri armati ed elicotteri contro i ribelli musulmani.

translation.en: I am a former CIA officer involved in the Afghan resistance
translation.it: Sono un ex agente della CIA che appoggiò la resistenza afgana contro l'occupazione sovietica.

translation.en: against the Soviet occupation.
translation.it: la resistenza afgana contro l'occupazione sovietica.

translation.en: The American people, at that time,
translation.it: Il popolo americano, a quel tempo,

translation.en: would have been scrambling to get their world atlas
translation.it: avrebbe fatto fatica a cercare sull'atlante mondiale

translation.en: to find out where the hell Afghanistan was.
translation.it: la posizione dell'Afghanistan.

translation.en: And why do we care?
translation.it: Perché ci tenevamo tanto?

translation.en: Well, we cared, at least in Washington,
translation.it: Ci tenevamo, almeno a Washington,

translation.en: because the Soviet Union,
translation.it: perché l'Unione Sovietica,

translation.en: the other side of the equation of a Cold War
translation.it: l'altro membro dell'equazione di una guerra fredda

translation.en: that had been running for decades at that time, since 1948,
translation.it: che era in corso ormai da decenni, dal 1948,

translation.en: for, you know, at a cost of, you know, $10 trillion or more,
translation.it: e ci era costata 10.000 miliardi di dollari o più,

translation.en: had moved outside its borders in a very flagrant way.
translation.it: aveva superato i suoi confini in modo molto plateale.

translation.en: And so the choice was, for any American president, any American administration,
translation.it: E quindi qualsiasi presidente o amministrazione americana

translation.en: you have to do something, you have to respond.
translation.it: avrebbe dovuto fare qualcosa, rispondere.

translation.en: The Soviet leaders have openly and publicly declared
translation.it: I leader sovietici hanno dichiarato pubblicamente

translation.en: that the only morality they recognize is that which will further their cause,
translation.it: che l'unica etica che riconoscono è quella che perora la loro causa,

translation.en: which is world revolution.
translation.it: ovvero la rivoluzione.

translation.en: [Bearden] Ronald Reagan comes in and he brings in a new director of Central Intelligence, and that's Bill Casey.
translation.it: Al suo arrivo, Ronald Reagan nominò un nuovo direttore della CIA, Bill Casey.

translation.en: Bill Casey called me up to his office and said,
translation.it: Bill Casey mi convocò e mi disse: "Devi andare in Afghanistan.

translation.en: "I want you to go to Afghanistan. I'll give you a billion dollars a year."
translation.it: Bill Casey mi convocò e mi disse: "Devi andare in Afghanistan. Ti do un miliardo all'anno. E devi far vincere quei ragazzi.

translation.en: "I don't want you to get these guys to win."
translation.it: Ti do un miliardo all'anno. E devi far vincere quei ragazzi.

translation.en: "We don't want to just fight to the last Afghan."
translation.it: Non vogliamo una lotta all'ultimo afgano, ma che tu vada lì

translation.en: "We want you to go and drive these guys out."
translation.it: Non vogliamo una lotta all'ultimo afgano, ma che tu vada lì e li cacci.

translation.en: "And if a billion isn't enough, I'll give you more."
translation.it: E se un miliardo non basta, ti darò di più".

translation.en: The pressure was on from that moment forward.
translation.it: Da quel momento, la pressione aumentò.

translation.en: Absolutely no backing down.
translation.it: Non potevamo assolutamente tirarci indietro.

translation.en: By 1985, there was possibly a million Afghans had been killed,
translation.it: Nel 1985, erano stati uccisi circa un milione di afgani.

translation.en: 1.5 million had been wounded or maimed,
translation.it: I feriti e i mutilati erano circa un milione e mezzo.

translation.en: a million had been driven into exile into Iran,
translation.it: Un milione di persone era stato esiliato in Iran

translation.en: and two million across the border into Pakistan.
translation.it: e due milioni oltre il confine con il Pakistan.

translation.en: Of a population of about 13 million at the time,
translation.it: Di una popolazione di circa 13 milioni,

translation.en: that's like a third have either been killed, wounded, or driven into exile.
translation.it: circa un terzo era stato ucciso, ferito o mandato in esilio.

translation.en: The decision was made. We're going to go into this thing.
translation.it: Ormai era deciso. Saremmo entrati in questa storia.

translation.en: So let's get on with it and make it go away.
translation.it: Non restava che darsi da fare e farla finita.

translation.en: The United States was giving literally billions of dollars in the crucial years,
translation.it: Gli Stati Uniti diedero miliardi di dollari, negli anni cruciali fra l'84 e l'86, ai mujahiddin.

translation.en: '84, '85, '86, to the mujahideen.
translation.it: negli anni cruciali fra l'84 e l'86, ai mujahiddin.

translation.en: [Rashid] The mujahideen were essentially the Afghans who rose up
translation.it: I mujahiddin erano essenzialmente gli afgani insorti in nome dell'Islam

translation.en: on the basis of Islam
translation.it: gli afgani insorti in nome dell'Islam

translation.en: to free their country from Soviet occupation.
translation.it: per liberare il Paese dall'occupazione sovietica.

translation.en: Jihad was essentially the Muslim struggle against oppression, dictatorship,
translation.it: La jihad era la lotta musulmana contro l'oppressione, la dittatura,

translation.en: authoritarianism, and non-Muslims who wanted to conquer Muslim territory.
translation.it: l'autoritarismo e i non musulmani che ambivano ai territori musulmani.

translation.en: [Bearden] One has to imagine the challenges
translation.it: Immaginiamo la difficoltà

translation.en: of delivering tens of thousands of tons of ordnance,
translation.it: di consegnare decine di migliaia di tonnellate di ordigni,

translation.en: and money, and other things to the Afghans in this war.
translation.it: denaro e altre cose agli afgani in questa guerra.

translation.en: On the Afghan side, we had seven separate party leaders.
translation.it: Da parte afgana, avevamo sette leader di fazioni diverse.

translation.en: They were representing both ethnic and tribal groups
translation.it: Rappresentavano gruppi etnici e tribù

translation.en: and separated by being fundamentalist or moderate.
translation.it: che si distinguevano tra fondamentalisti e moderati.

translation.en: The four fundamentalists included Gulbuddin Hekmatyar, The Dark Prince.
translation.it: Tra i quattro fondamentalisti c'era Gulbuddin Hekmatyar, il Principe Oscuro.

translation.en: Always wore a black turban, and everybody in the world, uh,
translation.it: Indossava sempre un turbante nero e tutti quanti,

translation.en: other than some of his commanders, absolutely hated him.
translation.it: tranne alcuni dei suoi comandanti, lo odiavano a morte.

translation.en: [reporter] One man in particular appears to have a reasonably strong following.
translation.it: Un uomo in particolare sembra avere un forte seguito.

translation.en: His name is Gulbuddin Hekmatyar…
translation.it: Si chiama Gulbuddin Hekmatyar.

translation.en: a 33-year-old former engineering student from Kabul University.
translation.it: Ha 33 anni e studiava ingegneria all'università di Kabul.

translation.en: [Rashid] He developed a very nasty reputation. He spent time at Kabul University.
translation.it: Si era fatto una brutta reputazione. Aveva frequentato l'università di Kabul.

translation.en: There was a very strong rumor, I remember,
translation.it: Girava voce, ricordo, che fosse stato lui

translation.en: that he was responsible for starting the trend
translation.it: Girava voce, ricordo, che fosse stato lui a inaugurare il trend di lanciare l'acido

translation.en: to throw acid into girls' faces,
translation.it: a inaugurare il trend di lanciare l'acido in faccia alle ragazze, perché all'epoca le donne non portavano il velo.

translation.en: because women at that time were not covered up.
translation.it: in faccia alle ragazze, perché all'epoca le donne non portavano il velo.

translation.en: They were in skirts and dresses and going to the university.
translation.it: Indossavano gonne e abiti e andavano all'università.

translation.en: Hekmatyar sentenced me to death because I was writing against him.
translation.it: Hekmatyar mi condannò a morte perché scrivevo contro di lui.

translation.en: [Hekmatyar, in Dari] A time came that we had no choice but to pick up arms.
translation.it: Non ci restava che imbracciare le armi.

translation.en: We were facing war and had no choice but to pick up arms.
translation.it: Eravamo in guerra e non avevamo altra scelta che prendere le armi.

translation.en: The Soviets wanted Afghanistan to turn into another one of their satellite states.
translation.it: I sovietici volevano trasformare l'Afghanistan in uno stato satellite.

translation.en: That was their mandate.
translation.it: Erano lì per questo.

translation.en: This is where I started my struggle to rescue the country.
translation.it: Fu allora che iniziai la mia lotta per salvare il Paese.

translation.en: It was all for the sake of my religious duties.
translation.it: Lo feci per il bene della mia religione.

translation.en: My motivations were my beliefs, and defending them.
translation.it: Le mie motivazioni erano le mie convinzioni e le difendevo.

translation.en: Soviet troops arrived. Some considered the presence of Soviet forces in Afghanistan
translation.it: Arrivarono i sovietici, la cui presenza in Afghanistan era considerata da alcuni

translation.en: a danger to their own freedom and sovereignty.
translation.it: un pericolo per la loro libertà e sovranità.

translation.en: The entire world felt danger. All regional countries felt danger.
translation.it: Tutto il mondo sentì quel pericolo. E anche i Paesi di quell'area.

translation.en: Iran, Pakistan, and Gulf countries were all feeling danger.
translation.it: L'Iran, il Pakistan e i Paesi del Golfo si sentirono in pericolo.

translation.en: Europe, America, and the West in general felt danger.
translation.it: E anche l'Europa, l'America e l'Occidente.

translation.en: They did not think that Afghans would be able to resist.
translation.it: Non pensavano che gli afgani avrebbero resistito.

translation.en: But, contrary to their expectations, the resistance began here.
translation.it: Ma, contrariamente alle aspettative, la resistenza iniziò qui.

translation.en: [Bearden] You're not interviewing these people so that one of them might marry your sister.
translation.it: Certa gente non si fa intervistare perché spera di sposare tua sorella.

translation.en: They do what was needed.
translation.it: Facevano quello che serviva.

translation.en: You had to work through that system, then the goods would flow to the commanders
translation.it: Bisognava aggirare il sistema per portare la merce

translation.en: who were doing the actual fighting including Ahmad Shah Massoud.
translation.it: ai comandanti in prima linea, fra cui Ahmad Shah Massoud a cui davo 250.000 dollari al mese.

translation.en: I gave him $250,000 a month.
translation.it: fra cui Ahmad Shah Massoud a cui davo 250.000 dollari al mese.

translation.en: Pretty soon, these shipments were coming in to Karachi Port
translation.it: Ben presto, queste spedizioni iniziarono a giungere al porto di Karachi

translation.en: and moving through the system and into Afghanistan.
translation.it: e a sfruttare il sistema per entrare in Afghanistan.

translation.en: The American effort moved from a 100-year-old design of an Enfield rifle
translation.it: L'impegno americano passò dalla consegna di centenari modelli di fucili Enfield

translation.en: up until we were having crates of AK-47s,
translation.it: a quella di casse di AK-47,

translation.en: 82-millimeter mortars, 107 and 122-millimeter rockets,
translation.it: mortai da 82 mm, missili da 107 e 122 mm,

translation.en: free-flight rockets that everybody loves so much,
translation.it: razzi a volo libero che tutti amavano tanto

translation.en: recoilless rifles.
translation.it: e cannoni senza rinculo.

translation.en: [Rashid] I remember very well in '88
translation.it: Ricordo bene, nell'88,

translation.en: crossing the border and going into Afghanistan briefly
translation.it: di essere entrato brevemente in Afghanistan

translation.en: for a quick trip with some foreign correspondents,
translation.it: per un viaggio con dei corrispondenti stranieri

translation.en: and seeing a huge column of fighters coming out of Afghanistan,
translation.it: e di aver visto un'enorme colonna di combattenti uscire dall'Afghanistan

translation.en: heading into Pakistan,
translation.it: diretta in Pakistan,

translation.en: saying that they were going for R&R, rest and recuperation.
translation.it: per cercare un po' di R&R, riposo e recupero.

translation.en: And I remember very well being quite shocked
translation.it: E ricordo benissimo la mia sorpresa

translation.en: to find that these were mostly Arabs, and Indonesians, and Filipinos,
translation.it: quando scoprii che si trattava soprattutto di arabi, indonesiani, filippini

translation.en: and people from all over.
translation.it: e gente di tutto il mondo.

translation.en: [Hekmatyar, in Dari] During a certain point,
translation.it: Per un certo periodo,

translation.en: a group of young Arabs joined the jihad.
translation.it: un gruppo di giovani arabi si unì alla jihad.

translation.en: Their number was not big.
translation.it: Non era molto numeroso.

translation.en: They were a limited number of young men.
translation.it: Era un numero limitato di giovani.

translation.en: Their countries of birth did not take the matter seriously.
translation.it: I loro Paesi di origine non avevano preso sul serio la questione.

translation.en: The West did not mind that they came and took part in this war.
translation.it: All'Occidente non importava che prendessero parte a questa guerra.

translation.en: There were a very small number of them.
translation.it: Erano davvero pochi.

translation.en: They also had one or two outposts.
translation.it: Avevano anche un paio di avamposti.

translation.en: They called them al-Qaeda.
translation.it: Li chiamavano al-Qaida.

translation.en: [Rashid] Osama bin Laden was a member of a very modern family, the bin Ladens,
translation.it: Osama Bin Laden apparteneva a una famiglia molto moderna di grandi appaltatori e uomini d'affari dell'Arabia Saudita.

translation.en: who were very big contractors and businessmen in Saudi Arabia.
translation.it: molto moderna di grandi appaltatori e uomini d'affari dell'Arabia Saudita.

translation.en: But he had this desire to do something for Islam and to wage jihad.
translation.it: Ma lui desiderava fare qualcosa per l'Islam e votarsi alla jihad.

translation.en: And he arrived in Peshawar with a lot of construction equipment,
translation.it: Arrivò a Peshawar con un sacco di macchinari edili,

translation.en: which his family owned, and he helped the mujahideen build tunnels
translation.it: di proprietà della famiglia, e aiutò i mujahiddin a costruire tunnel, depositi di munizioni

translation.en: and ammunition dumps and things like that.
translation.it: e aiutò i mujahiddin a costruire tunnel, depositi di munizioni e così via.

translation.en: He was venerated very, very quickly and supported by all those
translation.it: Ben presto, iniziò a essere venerato e sostenuto da tutti coloro che avevano sostenuto la guerra afgana contro i sovietici.

translation.en: who were supporting the Afghan war against the Soviets.
translation.it: da tutti coloro che avevano sostenuto la guerra afgana contro i sovietici.

translation.en: [Bearden] Osama bin Laden was in Afghanistan.
translation.it: Osama Bin Laden era in Afghanistan.

translation.en: He formed something that would be al-Qaeda,
translation.it: Formò il gruppo che sarebbe diventato al-Qaida

translation.en: which was just a collection of his guys.
translation.it: e che era solo un manipolo dei suoi uomini.

translation.en: It never became a big issue for CIA or anybody else.
translation.it: Non costituì mai un grosso problema né per la CIA né per nessun altro.

translation.en: [Hoffman] In the 1980s, we were consumed with the Cold War,
translation.it: Negli anni '80 aleggiava la guerra fredda

translation.en: and with the threat from the Soviet Union.
translation.it: e la minaccia dell'Unione Sovietica.

translation.en: But behind the scenes, I think very poorly understood and underappreciated,
translation.it: Ma dietro le quinte, il fenomeno era stato frainteso e sottovalutato.

translation.en: what was occurring was a fusion of politics and religion.
translation.it: Assistevamo a una fusione fra politica e religione.

translation.en: [reporter] In the mosques throughout the countryside, teachers call people to join the fighting…
translation.it: Nelle moschee di campagna, gli insegnanti chiamano alla jihad

translation.en: telling them why jihad is obligatory for them.
translation.it: spiegando perché era obbligatoria.

translation.en: [Hoffman] We failed to appreciate how these calls on Muslims
translation.it: Non riuscimmo a capire in che modo l'appello ai musulmani

translation.en: from throughout the world to come fight in Afghanistan
translation.it: di tutto il mondo a venire in Afghanistan

translation.en: and also to give financial support to the mujahideen, to the holy warriors,
translation.it: e a dare sostegno finanziario ai mujahiddin, o guerrieri sacri,

translation.en: was really transforming the nature of terrorism.
translation.it: stesse cambiando la natura del terrorismo.

translation.en: [Rashid] In those days, the Afghans were lobbying for the stinger missiles.
translation.it: POLITICO AFGANO Allora, gli afgani premevano per avere i missili stinger

translation.en: And so were American politicians and CIA officials.
translation.it: così come i politici americani e i funzionari della CIA.

translation.en: And, finally, President Reagan agreed
translation.it: Infine, il presidente Reagan accettò

translation.en: to give them a limited number of stinger missiles,
translation.it: di dare loro un numero limitato di stinger,

translation.en: which were the state-of-the-art missiles to shoot down Soviet planes.
translation.it: che erano i missili più all'avanguardia per abbattere gli aerei sovietici.

translation.en: They were trained to shoot these planes down as they were landing at Soviet airports.
translation.it: Erano in grado di abbatterli quando atterravano nei loro aeroporti.

translation.en: [Bearden] I brought stingers in, and in September
translation.it: Portai gli stinger e, a settembre, mettemmo in campo la prima squadra,

translation.en: we sent out our first team.
translation.it: e, a settembre, mettemmo in campo la prima squadra,

translation.en: Just a hunter-killer group outside of Jalalabad,
translation.it: ovvero un gruppo di attacco fuori Jalalabad

translation.en: waiting for a flight of Soviet MI-24 Deltas
translation.it: in attesa di qualche MI-24 Delta sovietico

translation.en: to come in from Kabul flying to Jalalabad.
translation.it: in volo da Kabul a Jalalabad.

translation.en: And our guys popped up and boom, boom, boom.
translation.it: I nostri ragazzi spuntarono fuori e…

translation.en: The gunner fired and went just like an arc across the sky,
translation.it: Il missile sparato formò un arco nel cielo

translation.en: trailing that white plume behind it,
translation.it: seguito da un pennacchio bianco

translation.en: and popped the first helicopter, and then boom, boom, boom.
translation.it: e abbatté il primo elicottero e poi…

translation.en: So after that, the morale of the Afghan resistance
translation.it: Dopo questa azione, il morale della resistenza afgana

translation.en: went from patiently waiting for martyrdom
translation.it: passò da un'attesa paziente del martirio

translation.en: to, you know, "Patience, my ass. Let's go out and make some trouble."
translation.it: a un: "Pazienza un corno. Diamo loro del filo da torcere".

translation.en: It worked.
translation.it: E funzionò.

translation.en: The Soviets never had a good day from when we got the stinger in
translation.it: Dopo l'arrivo degli stinger, i sovietici non ebbero più pace

translation.en: until they left.
translation.it: e dovettero andarsene.

translation.en: That was it. The war changed.
translation.it: Ecco, la guerra era cambiata.

translation.en: [reporter 1] The last Soviet soldiers left Afghanistan after nine years of war.
translation.it: Gli ultimi soldati sovietici sono usciti dall'Afghanistan dopo nove anni di guerra.

translation.en: Nine years of occupation and death.
translation.it: Nove anni di occupazione e morte.

translation.en: At least 15,000 Soviets were killed,
translation.it: Almeno 15.000 sovietici sono morti

translation.en: along with many thousands of Afghan rebels and civilians.
translation.it: insieme a molte migliaia di ribelli e civili afgani.

translation.en: [reporter 2] On the tanks, the soldiers waved and smiled and shouted.
translation.it: Sui carri, i soldati salutavano, sorridevano e urlavano.

translation.en: They were leaving and they were relieved.
translation.it: Se ne stavano andando ed erano sollevati.

translation.en: [Bearden] I actually had gone in that morning to be on Afghan soil
translation.it: Quella mattina ero andato in territorio afgano

translation.en: for when the Soviets left.
translation.it: per assistere alla ritirata.

translation.en: It was purely symbolic, but I was there.
translation.it: Era una presenza puramente simbolica, ma comunque c'ero.

translation.en: They left, I came back, turned out my light that night,
translation.it: Loro se ne andarono e io quella sera spensi la luce

translation.en: and that was my message to the KGB, a little over a kilometer away:
translation.it: come per mandare un messaggio al KGB a poco più di un chilometro da lì:

translation.en: "Game over, guys. You lost."
translation.it: "È finita. Avete perso".

translation.en: [Rashid] It became a kind of common assessment in the Muslim world
translation.it: Divenne opinione comune nel mondo musulmano

translation.en: that Muslim armies, led by the brave mujahideen,
translation.it: che gli eserciti guidati dai coraggiosi mujahiddin

translation.en: had actually defeated the Soviets.
translation.it: avevano sconfitto i sovietici.

translation.en: [Hekmatyar, in Dari] My tears flowed.
translation.it: Mi scendevano le lacrime.

translation.en: Even when I was praying, I was still crying.
translation.it: Non riuscivo a smettere di piangere nemmeno mentre pregavo.

translation.en: For two days, I kept crying.
translation.it: Continuai a piangere per due giorni.

translation.en: It was like I had achieved one of my biggest dreams unexpectedly,
translation.it: Era come se si fosse avverato uno dei miei sogni più grandi

translation.en: and before it was supposed to happen.
translation.it: prima del previsto.

translation.en: I achieved my biggest dream
translation.it: Avevo realizzato il mio sogno più grande.

translation.en: that the last occupier soldier had left the country.
translation.it: L'ultimo soldato occupante aveva lasciato il Paese.

translation.en: I did not expect that it would happen that soon.
translation.it: Ma non me l'aspettavo così presto.

translation.en: I was sure. I believed that the Soviets will be defeated in the country.
translation.it: Ero da sempre convinto che i sovietici sarebbero stati sconfitti.

translation.en: But not this soon.
translation.it: Ma non così presto.

translation.en: That is how I felt.
translation.it: Mi sentivo così.

translation.en: [Bearden] Hekmatyar believed that sooner or later I'd have him killed.
translation.it: Hekmatyar credeva che prima o poi l'avrei fatto uccidere.

translation.en: The last meeting I had with Gulbuddin Hekmatyar…
translation.it: Durante il nostro ultimo incontro,

translation.en: you know, he said, "You've come here to kill me."
translation.it: mi disse: "È venuto a uccidermi".

translation.en: And I said,
translation.it: E io dissi:

translation.en: "No, engineer. I'm not going to kill you… today."
translation.it: "No, ingegnere. Non la ucciderò oggi".

translation.en: [Hoffman] Remember what it was like in the United States in the early 1990s.
translation.it: Ripensando agli Stati Uniti dei primi anni '90,

translation.en: We were triumphant.
translation.it: c'era aria di trionfo.

translation.en: President Bush, the first President Bush, was inaugurating what was gonna be a new world order
translation.it: Il primo presidente Bush stava inaugurando un nuovo ordine mondiale

translation.en: that would spread democracy and the magnificence of the Western liberal state
translation.it: che avrebbe diffuso la democrazia e la grandezza del liberalismo occidentale

translation.en: and capitalism throughout the world.
translation.it: e del capitalismo in tutto il mondo.

translation.en: So we weren't paying attention.
translation.it: Eravamo distratti.

translation.en: I mean, we were fixated on the world through our eyes.
translation.it: Cioè, eravamo concentrati sulla nostra visione del mondo.

translation.en: One that was democratic, that was also materialistic as well.
translation.it: Un mondo democratico, ma anche materialista.

translation.en: We failed to understand and to comprehend the power of religion.
translation.it: Non riuscendo a comprendere appieno il potere della religione,

translation.en: So we didn't understand what had happened in Afghanistan was not the closing act
translation.it: non capimmo che quanto era successo in Afghanistan non era l'atto finale,

translation.en: but a prelude to something far more serious and more consequential.
translation.it: bensì il preludio di qualcosa di più serio e importante.

translation.en: Especially after Saddam Hussein invaded Kuwait.
translation.it: Specie dopo che Saddam Hussein ebbe invaso il Kuwait.

translation.en: Iraq invaded Kuwait this morning,
translation.it: L'Iraq ha invaso il Kuwait, un'invasione a regola d'arte

translation.en: a perfectly executed invasion that caught the world by surprise.
translation.it: L'Iraq ha invaso il Kuwait, un'invasione a regola d'arte che ci ha colti di sorpresa.

translation.en: The attack coming just hours after Iraq broke off talks with Kuwait over disputed oil fields.
translation.it: L'attacco è avvenuto poche ore dopo lo stop dei colloqui sui giacimenti.

translation.en: [Hoffman] The United States and United Kingdom, amongst other countries,
translation.it: Gli USA e il Regno Unito, tra gli altri Paesi,

translation.en: immediately responded to Saddam Hussein and Iraq's invasion of Kuwait,
translation.it: reagirono subito a Saddam Hussein e all'invasione irachena del Kuwait

translation.en: by dispatching warships and ground forces to protect Saudi Arabia
translation.it: inviando navi da guerra e forze di terra per proteggere l'Arabia Saudita

translation.en: and to safeguard the rest of the Arabian Peninsula
translation.it: e il resto della penisola arabica

translation.en: from any attempt by Iraq to expand its control
translation.it: da qualsiasi tentativo dell'Iraq di espandere il suo controllo

translation.en: over the world's oil supplies.
translation.it: sulle scorte mondiali di petrolio.

translation.en: [man] When I came to the FBI,
translation.it: Quando arrivai all'FBI,

translation.en: terrorist groups were something that I was studying.
translation.it: mi stavo dedicando allo studio dei gruppi terroristici.

translation.en: I was really interested in groups like Hamas, groups like Hezbollah,
translation.it: Ero molto interessato a gruppi come Hamas, Hezbollah, il Movimento per la jihad islamica in Palestina

translation.en: groups like PIJ, Palestinian Islamic Jihad.
translation.it: Hezbollah, il Movimento per la jihad islamica in Palestina

translation.en: And this weird guy who gives all these different interviews.
translation.it: e a questo strano tipo che concedeva un sacco di interviste.

translation.en: [interviewer] What are your future plans?
translation.it: Che progetti ha per il futuro?

translation.en: [interpreter] You'll see them and hear about them in the media.
translation.it: Li vedrete e ne sentirete parlare nei media.

translation.en: God willing.
translation.it: Se Dio vorrà.

translation.en: [Soufan] Who is he? What's his intention?
translation.it: Chi è? Che intenzioni ha?

translation.en: And when you talk to people in the US government at the time,
translation.it: E molti dei membri del governo americano dell'epoca

translation.en: most of them tell you, "Ah, he's just a financier."
translation.it: dicevano che era solo un finanziatore

translation.en: "He finances Islamic causes around the world."
translation.it: delle cause islamiche in tutto il mondo,

translation.en: But there was something more sinister to him.
translation.it: ma in lui c'era qualcosa di più sinistro.

translation.en: Osama bin Laden had a lot of difficulties trying to explain to his followers
translation.it: Per Osama Bin Laden fu difficile cercare di spiegare ai suoi seguaci

translation.en: his religious justification of fighting the United States.
translation.it: che la lotta agli USA aveva una giustificazione religiosa.

translation.en: After all, the United States gave the mujahideen aid,
translation.it: Dopotutto, gli Stati Uniti avevano aiutato i mujahiddin

translation.en: helped the Afghani people defeat the Soviet communists.
translation.it: e il popolo afgano a sconfiggere i comunisti sovietici.

translation.en: When Saddam Hussein invaded Kuwait,
translation.it: L'invasione irachena del Kuwait

translation.en: it was a wake-up call for people like Osama bin Laden.
translation.it: fu un campanello d'allarme per gente come Osama Bin Laden.

translation.en: They said, "See? We told you."
translation.it: Dissero: "Visto? Ve l'avevamo detto.

translation.en: "The United States wanted to invade Muslim lands."
translation.it: Gli Stati Uniti volevano invadere i territori musulmani,

translation.en: "They wanted to invade the lands of the two holy places,
translation.it: volevano invadere i territori dei due luoghi sacri,

translation.en: to steal the oil and steal the wealth of the Muslims."
translation.it: per rubare il petrolio e la ricchezza dei musulmani".

translation.en: [Hoffman] This solidified in Osama bin Laden's mind that the United States was no different from the Soviet Union
translation.it: Osama Bin Laden si convinse che gli USA non erano diversi dall'Unione Sovietica

translation.en: and was, through the ruse of protecting Saudi Arabia,
translation.it: e, con la scusa di proteggere l'Arabia Saudita,

translation.en: attempting to subjugate Muslim peoples
translation.it: tentavano di soggiogare i musulmani

translation.en: and also to seize control of the Muslims' most precious natural resource:
translation.it: e di prendere il controllo della loro risorsa naturale più preziosa,

translation.en: its oil and natural gas reserves in that region of the world.
translation.it: le riserve di petrolio e gas naturale in quell'area del mondo.

translation.en: He portrayed himself as the lone man, the person deeply devoted to his religion
translation.it: Si ritraeva come l'uomo solitario profondamente devoto alla sua religione

translation.en: who was standing up against this cultural tide of homogeneity,
translation.it: che si opponeva a questa corrente culturale di omogeneità,

translation.en: of Western influence and dominance, and saying, "Enough!"
translation.it: influenza e dominio occidentale a cui diceva: "Basta!

translation.en: "We have our own beliefs, our own way of living,
translation.it: Abbiamo le nostre convinzioni, il nostro stile di vita

translation.en: and we reject that, and you are trying to impose it on us."
translation.it: e rifiutiamo ciò che state cercando di imporci.

translation.en: "Therefore, we have no choice but to fight and to strike back."
translation.it: Perciò possiamo solo combattere e contrattaccare".

translation.en: [Soufan] He decided to declare jihad on the United States.
translation.it: Decise di dichiarare la jihad agli Stati Uniti.

translation.en: He thought that this is his opportunity to wake up the Muslim world,
translation.it: Pensava che questa fosse la sua occasione per svegliare il mondo musulmano

translation.en: and they need to start thinking about defeating the other remaining superpower.
translation.it: e che dovevano iniziare a pensare di sconfiggere la superpotenza superstite.

translation.en: [David Dinkins] At approximately 12:15 p.m.
translation.it: Intorno alle 12:15,

translation.en: there was a large explosion at the World Trade Center,
translation.it: c'è stata una grossa esplosione al WTC

translation.en: which caused the collapse of several floors
translation.it: che ha causato il crollo di vari piani del parcheggio sotterraneo della Torre Uno.

translation.en: in the basement of the parking level beneath Tower One.
translation.it: di vari piani del parcheggio sotterraneo della Torre Uno.

translation.en: [reporter] They stream from the stairway by the hundreds.
translation.it: Escono dalle scale a centinaia.

translation.en: The joyful end of a two-hour journey down the smoke-filled staircase,
translation.it: È il lieto fine di una discesa di due ore per le scale piene di fumo,

translation.en: staggering, coughing.
translation.it: barcollando e tossendo.

translation.en: Five are known dead at this point, more than 200 hurt in the blast
translation.it: Si contano finora cinque morti e più di 200 feriti nell'esplosione del secondo edificio più alto del Paese.

translation.en: that rocked the nation's second tallest building.
translation.it: e più di 200 feriti nell'esplosione del secondo edificio più alto del Paese.

translation.en: [Hoffman] The first World Trade Center bombing was really independent of al-Qaeda,
translation.it: Il primo attentato al WTC non fu opera di al-Qaida,

translation.en: even though al-Qaeda had been formed five years before.
translation.it: sebbene il gruppo esistesse già da cinque anni.

translation.en: That's not to say it was completely unconnected to al-Qaeda.
translation.it: Ciò non significa che al-Qaida ne fosse estranea,

translation.en: Al-Qaeda was not involved in any active sense.
translation.it: ma non era coinvolta in senso attivo.

translation.en: Al-Qaeda, at that stage, was still plotting and planning.
translation.it: Al-Qaida, in quel momento, stava ancora tramando e pianificando.

translation.en: It was an operation carried out by acolytes or followers
translation.it: Fu un'operazione compiuta da accoliti o seguaci

translation.en: of the Blind Sheikh, Abdel-Rahman,
translation.it: dello Sceicco Cieco, Abdel-Rahman, che Bin Laden considerava

translation.en: who bin Laden counted as one of his spiritual mentors as well.
translation.it: dello Sceicco Cieco, Abdel-Rahman, che Bin Laden considerava uno dei suoi mentori spirituali.

translation.en: [Soufan] Omar Abdel-Rahman, he was able to escape Egypt and come to the United States,
translation.it: Omar Abdel-Rahman era riuscito a fuggire negli Stati Uniti dall'Egitto,

translation.en: because people in the US government believed that this guy is on our side.
translation.it: perché i nostri governanti credevano che fosse dalla nostra parte.

translation.en: This guy fought against the Soviets, helped to defeat the Soviets.
translation.it: Aveva combattuto contro i sovietici e contribuito a sconfiggerli,

translation.en: So there is no way he is gonna have any animosity towards the United States.
translation.it: quindi non aveva motivo di nutrire del risentimento verso gli Stati Uniti.

translation.en: They were wrong.
translation.it: Ma si sbagliavano.

translation.en: [Hoffman] We know that Ramzi Ahmed Yousef,
translation.it: Sappiamo che Ramzi Ahmed Yousef,

translation.en: the mastermind behind the 1993 bombing of the World Trade Center,
translation.it: la mente dietro all'attentato al World Trade Center del 1993,

translation.en: had sought to topple one tower onto the other
translation.it: aveva cercato di far cadere una torre sull'altra

translation.en: with a view of killing 60,000 people.
translation.it: con l'intento di uccidere 60.000 persone.

translation.en: He was thinking on a vastly different scale than terrorists had thought before.
translation.it: Pensava su una scala molto diversa rispetto a tutti i terroristi finora.
