translation.en: And so was his uncle, Khalid Sheikh Mohammed.
translation.it: Come lo zio Khalid Shaykh Mohammed.

translation.en: [Soufan] At the very beginning, Khalid Sheikh Mohammed
translation.it: All'inizio, Khalid Shaykh Mohammed

translation.en: really wanted the World Trade Center down.
translation.it: voleva davvero distruggere il WTC.

translation.en: Ramzi Yousef, his relative, when he got caught,
translation.it: Ramzi Yousef, un suo parente, quando fu catturato,

translation.en: they put him on a helicopter, bringing him to New York so he can go to jail.
translation.it: fu portato a New York in elicottero per essere incarcerato.

translation.en: They showed him the World Trade Center
translation.it: Gli mostrarono il World Trade Center

translation.en: and they said, "See? It's still up."
translation.it: e gli dissero: "Vedi? È ancora in piedi".

translation.en: And he said, "If I had more money, it won't be."
translation.it: E lui disse: "Se avessi avuto più soldi, non sarebbe così".

translation.en: [Hoffman] What underscored, I think, how serious the 1993 World Trade Center attack was,
translation.it: La grande importanza dell'attacco al World Trade Center del 1993

translation.en: was the fact that it was not an isolated one-off phenomenon.
translation.it: viene dal fatto che non fu un atto isolato,

translation.en: Because the following June, in June 1993, another plot was uncovered.
translation.it: perché nel giugno dello stesso anno fu scoperto un altro complotto.

translation.en: [man] Most of my career, I was an NCIS special agent.
translation.it: Ho lavorato quasi sempre come agente dell'NCIS.

translation.en: Went through the ranks up to the deputy assistant director level.
translation.it: Sono salito di grado fino a diventare vicedirettore.

translation.en: And in that capacity, my primary responsibility was threat warnings for the Navy, Marine Corps.
translation.it: E in quella veste mi sono occupato soprattutto di minacce alla Marina.

translation.en: The cell that I was working against
translation.it: La cellula contro cui lavoravo

translation.en: was seeking to assassinate Hosni Mubarak, the president of Egypt,
translation.it: cercava di assassinare Hosni Mubarak, il presidente egiziano,

translation.en: and blow up the Holland and Lincoln tunnels, plant bombs in those tunnels.
translation.it: e di far esplodere delle bombe nei tunnel Holland e Lincoln.

translation.en: They were going to shoot the guards at the federal building,
translation.it: Avrebbero sparato alle guardie del palazzo federale

translation.en: 26 Federal Plaza,
translation.it: in Federal Plaza 26,

translation.en: drive a truck underneath with explosives in it to blow up the Federal Building…
translation.it: portato un camion con l'esplosivo per farlo saltare

translation.en: and looking at other landmarks in New York City to attack us.
translation.it: e individuato altri luoghi strategici a New York in cui attaccarci.

translation.en: [reporter] Members of a joint terrorism task force seized barrels of evidence
translation.it: Una task force congiunta ha sequestrato barili di prove

translation.en: and arrested eight people in New York and New Jersey.
translation.it: ed eseguito otto arresti.

translation.en: The suspects are said to be linked to Sheikh Omar Abdel Rahman.
translation.it: Pare che i sospettati siano collegati allo sceicco Omar Abdel-Rahman.

translation.en: [Soufan] They took the cell down at the last minute.
translation.it: Smantellarono la cellula all'ultimo minuto.

translation.en: And there is CCTV videos that were put on trial as evidence, as exhibits.
translation.it: Furono acquisiti alcuni video di telecamere a circuito chiuso, come prove, in cui si vedeva un uomo che pregava

translation.en: And you see one guy praying…
translation.it: come prove, in cui si vedeva un uomo che pregava

translation.en: and next to him, one guy literally mixing the bomb.
translation.it: e, accanto a lui, un altro che assemblava la bomba.

translation.en: So they stopped them at the last minute.
translation.it: Li fermarono all'ultimo minuto.

translation.en: [Fallon] We wound up bringing to justice ten suspects.
translation.it: Alla fine, assicurammo alla giustizia dieci sospettati.

translation.en: [Soufan] The FBI and other folks in the intelligence community
translation.it: L'FBI e parti dell'intelligence iniziarono

translation.en: start focusing on this jihadi threat.
translation.it: a concentrarsi sul pericolo jihadista.

translation.en: And Osama bin Laden, by then, was based in Sudan.
translation.it: Intanto, Osama Bin Laden si era stabilito in Sudan.

translation.en: He was openly declaring jihad and declaring war on the United States.
translation.it: Aveva proclamato apertamente la jihad e dichiarato guerra agli Stati Uniti.

translation.en: [Bearden] The Sudanese come to the Americans, say, "You want him?"
translation.it: I sudanesi ci chiesero: "Lo volete?"

translation.en: And we said, "We don't have enough on him to do anything, so no, we don't want him."
translation.it: E noi: "Non abbiamo abbastanza prove contro di lui, quindi no".

translation.en: The Sudanese then came and said, "How about he goes to Afghanistan?
translation.it: Allora i sudanesi ci dissero: "E se andasse in Afghanistan?"

translation.en: And the Saudis and Americans said…
translation.it: E i sauditi e gli americani:

translation.en: "What a wonderful idea!"
translation.it: "Che idea meravigliosa!

translation.en: "That's so far away. What kind of trouble can he get into there?"
translation.it: È così lontano. Non potrà certo combinare un granché".

translation.en: [Bearden] After we left Afghanistan in 1989,
translation.it: Dopo la nostra uscita dall'Afghanistan nel 1989,

translation.en: all of those parties that we dealt with,
translation.it: tutte le fazioni in causa,

translation.en: the Seven Sisters, began jockeying for position.
translation.it: le Sette Sorelle, iniziarono a reclamare la propria posizione.

translation.en: In effect, we walked away.
translation.it: In effetti, noi uscimmo di scena.

translation.en: There was probably no thought given
translation.it: Probabilmente nessuno aveva pensato

translation.en: to aftercare in the case of a victory,
translation.it: a cosa fare dopo in caso di vittoria

translation.en: and it was a failed state.
translation.it: ed era uno Stato in rovina.

translation.en: [Rashid] And so what we saw was the withdrawal of the Soviets in '89,
translation.it: Il ritiro sovietico, avvenuto nel 1989

translation.en: and with no political settlement inside Afghanistan,
translation.it: senza un accordo politico in Afghanistan,

translation.en: it immediately led to the civil war.
translation.it: portò subito alla guerra civile.

translation.en: Kabul was utterly destroyed in the civil war.
translation.it: Kabul fu completamente distrutta.

translation.en: [Soufan] When he went to Afghanistan,
translation.it: Al suo arrivo,

translation.en: there was a new group in Afghanistan that was winning the battle
translation.it: c'era un nuovo gruppo in Afghanistan che stava vincendo la guerra

translation.en: that took place after the Soviets pull out among all the mujahideen
translation.it: scoppiata dopo il ritiro dei sovietici fra tutti i mujahiddin

translation.en: and all the different warlords.
translation.it: e i signori della guerra.

translation.en: That group was called the Taliban.
translation.it: Si trattava dei talebani.

translation.en: [Rashid] They emerged as this force which would do good,
translation.it: Emersero come forza positiva

translation.en: and do better, and bring peace to Afghanistan,
translation.it: che avrebbe migliorato l'Afghanistan e portato la pace.

translation.en: which essentially, in the beginning, they did.
translation.it: E all'inizio fu così.

translation.en: Because when they came to Kandahar, they drove out all the petty warlords.
translation.it: Quando arrivarono a Kandahar, infatti, cacciarono tutti i signori della guerra.

translation.en: [man] Afghanistan in the 1990s was-- It's hard to describe.
translation.it: L'Afghanistan negli anni '90 era difficile da descrivere.

translation.en: It was another world. It was completely and utterly destroyed.
translation.it: Era un altro mondo. Era stato completamente distrutto.

translation.en: The Taliban didn't let foreigners in very often.
translation.it: I talebani, spesso, non ammettevano gli stranieri.

translation.en: I got lucky. I got a visa and I drove in. I drove to the capital.
translation.it: Io ebbi la fortuna di ottenere il visto e andai in auto fino alla capitale.

translation.en: All the roads are blown up, cratered.
translation.it: Tutte le strade erano esplose, piene di voragini.

translation.en: There are Soviet armored vehicles,
translation.it: C'erano veicoli blindati sovietici, carri armati

translation.en: tanks overturned, broken, rusty everywhere.
translation.it: C'erano veicoli blindati sovietici, carri armati ribaltati, rotti e arrugginiti ovunque. Per tutta la strada per Kabul.

translation.en: Like, all along the road to Kabul.
translation.it: ribaltati, rotti e arrugginiti ovunque. Per tutta la strada per Kabul.

translation.en: You know, the war had ended ten years before and nobody cleaned it up.
translation.it: La guerra era finita da dieci anni e nessuno l'aveva ripulita.

translation.en: I went to my hotel. The windows were gone. There was no running water. There was no electricity.
translation.it: Nel mio hotel non c'erano le finestre. E nemmeno l'acqua e l'elettricità.

translation.en: You just didn't see women.
translation.it: E non c'erano donne.

translation.en: Women were not allowed to walk unaccompanied…
translation.it: Le donne non potevano camminare da sole,

translation.en: you know, either by their husband or a male member of their family, alone.
translation.it: senza marito o un maschio della famiglia.

translation.en: And so occasionally you would see a woman,
translation.it: Ogni tanto si vedeva una donna

translation.en: and if she were outside, she had a head-to-toe burqa on so you couldn't see her face.
translation.it: che indossava un burqa integrale che le copriva il volto.

translation.en: And girls were banned from going to school.
translation.it: Alle ragazze fu inoltre proibito di andare a scuola.

translation.en: The Taliban were kind of the meanest, toughest guys in town.
translation.it: I talebani erano il gruppo più crudele e duro della città.

translation.en: They brought the civil war to an end, but they had imposed this kind of draconian,
translation.it: Avevano messo fine alla guerra civile, ma avevano imposto alla società

translation.en: medieval kind of peace on the society.
translation.it: una pace draconiana di stampo medievale.

translation.en: The first night I got there,
translation.it: La prima sera

translation.en: there was a knock on my door from one of the Taliban guys, and he said,
translation.it: un talebano bussò alla mia porta e mi disse:

translation.en: "We would like you to come tomorrow to an amputation and an execution."
translation.it: "Vorremmo che domani assistessi a un'amputazione e a un'esecuzione".

translation.en: So I and a couple other reporters, we went to the Kabul sports stadium,
translation.it: Così io e un paio di altri giornalisti andammo allo stadio di Kabul

translation.en: and they brought us down to the midfield on the soccer field.
translation.it: dove fummo portati al centro del campo da calcio.

translation.en: I mean, the amputation was a kind of warm-up act, and they did that, and cut off the guy's hand right in front of everybody.
translation.it: L'amputazione fu solo il riscaldamento. Tagliarono la mano a un uomo in pubblico.

translation.en: But then they brought the guy in to be executed, and it was, you know, it was like-- It was like something out of a nightmare.
translation.it: Ma poi fu la volta dell'esecuzione e fu una scena da incubo.

translation.en: He was blindfolded. They set him on midfield.
translation.it: Lo misero in mezzo al campo bendato.

translation.en: He apparently had murdered someone in an irrigation dispute.
translation.it: Aveva ucciso qualcuno per i diritti di irrigazione.

translation.en: The family of the victim was there.
translation.it: C'era la famiglia della vittima

translation.en: His family was there. And his family, they were sobbing and they were begging for mercy.
translation.it: e anche la sua famiglia che singhiozzava e implorava pietà.

translation.en: "Please spare him. Please spare him."
translation.it: "Per favore, risparmiatelo."

translation.en: And the family of the victim was saying, "No, no, no."
translation.it: E la famiglia della vittima disse: "No".

translation.en: And the Taliban handed a rifle to the brother of the victim.
translation.it: I talebani porsero un fucile al fratello della vittima che si spostò al centro del campo.

translation.en: And he walked out to midfield,
translation.it: della vittima che si spostò al centro del campo.

translation.en: and all the while they're reading the Qur'an into a loudspeaker.
translation.it: Nel frattempo si sentiva leggere il Corano da un altoparlante.

translation.en: The brother takes the rifle and shoots the guy.
translation.it: Il fratello prese il fucile e sparò all'uomo.

translation.en: I mean, he kind of falls over, they cart him off, and that was it.
translation.it: Lui cadde, fu portato via e la cosa finì lì.

translation.en: And that's what it was like there.
translation.it: La situazione era questa.

translation.en: [man, in Dari] The rule of the Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan in Afghanistan
translation.it: Il governo dell'Emirato islamico dell'Afghanistan in Afghanistan

translation.en: lasted almost for about seven years from beginning to end.
translation.it: durò in tutto quasi sette anni.

translation.en: The people of Afghanistan have some good memories of that period.
translation.it: Il popolo afgano ha dei bei ricordi di quel periodo.

translation.en: I personally have the memory of security in my mind.
translation.it: Personalmente, ricordo il senso di sicurezza. EX LEADER TALEBANO

translation.en: Security prevailed throughout Afghanistan.
translation.it: La sicurezza era la cosa più importante in tutto l'Afghanistan.

translation.en: Certainly no Afghan could have killed another person at that time,
translation.it: Di certo nessun afgano avrebbe potuto uccidere un'altra persona

translation.en: because of their personal animosities.
translation.it: per avversione personale.

translation.en: [reporter] The Muslim extremists, known as the Taliban militia,
translation.it: Gli estremisti musulmani, o milizie talebane,

translation.en: have not only trampled on women's rights and banned most modern pleasures…
translation.it: hanno calpestato i diritti delle donne e bandito i piaceri più moderni.

translation.en: since taking over most of Afghanistan, they have made it a haven
translation.it: Hanno conquistato gran parte del Paese facendone un rifugio

translation.en: for some of the world's most dangerous terrorists.
translation.it: per alcuni dei terroristi più pericolosi.

translation.en: [Rashid] Osama bin Laden had done a great deal for their ostensible leader, Mullah Omar,
translation.it: Osama Bin Laden aveva fatto molto per il loro leader, il Mullah Omar,

translation.en: in strengthening Mullah Omar's position.
translation.it: rafforzandone la posizione.

translation.en: Now what, of course, Mullah Omar may have made him promise to do
translation.it: La promessa che il Mullah Omar potrebbe avergli strappato

translation.en: was not to launch any attack on the Americans from Afghan soil.
translation.it: fu quella di non attaccare gli americani sul suolo afgano.

translation.en: It was well known that Osama wouldn't be sitting idly by doing nothing.
translation.it: Era risaputo che Osama non sarebbe rimasto a guardare.

translation.en: [Hoffman] On the eighth anniversary of the deployment of the first US troops to Saudi Arabia,
translation.it: Nell'ottavo anniversario dell'invio delle truppe USA in Arabia Saudita,

translation.en: bin Laden launched simultaneous attacks against the US embassies in East Africa.
translation.it: Bin Laden lanciò attacchi simultanei alle ambasciate USA in Africa Orientale.

translation.en: [Hoffman] The fact they were simultaneous attacks just ratcheted up that threat
translation.it: Gli attacchi simultanei resero più concreta la minaccia

translation.en: that terrorists could strike at more than one place at one time.
translation.it: che i terroristi potessero colpire in più luoghi insieme.

translation.en: [Bill Clinton] These acts of terrorist violence are abhorrent. They are inhuman.
translation.it: Questi atti di violenza terroristica sono ripugnanti e disumani.

translation.en: We will use all the means at our disposal…
translation.it: Useremo tutti i mezzi di cui disponiamo

translation.en: to bring those responsible to justice…
translation.it: per assicurare i responsabili alla giustizia,

translation.en: no matter what, or how long it takes.
translation.it: a prescindere da cosa e da quanto tempo occorrerà.

translation.en: [Soufan] We knew that al-Qaeda is not just going to pack and go home.
translation.it: Sapevamo che al-Qaida non intendeva certo uscire di scena.

translation.en: They're going to try to do something else.
translation.it: Avrebbero tentato altre azioni.

translation.en: We had intelligence that said they were planning
translation.it: Avevamo saputo che stavano progettando

translation.en: to bomb a few hotels in Jordan.
translation.it: di bombardare alcuni hotel in Giordania.

translation.en: Also, they were planning to assassinate the Pope, John Paul II,
translation.it: Volevano anche assassinare il papa Giovanni Paolo II

translation.en: when he was doing baptism on the Jordan River,
translation.it: mentre battezzava sul Giordano

translation.en: and attack pilgrims coming from Israel to Jordan on the land border.
translation.it: e attaccare alla frontiera i pellegrini che venivano da Israele.

translation.en: So that was a huge plot, and literally we took the whole cell down.
translation.it: Era un piano molto ambizioso e riuscimmo a smantellare tutta la cellula.

translation.en: [interviewer] Do you expect, worry, that there will be an incident of terrorism
translation.it: Pensa che ci sarà un attentato terroristico prima di Capodanno?

translation.en: before the first of the year?
translation.it: un attentato terroristico prima di Capodanno?

translation.en: We are on a heightened state of alert, and we're doing a lot of work on this.
translation.it: 22 DICEMBRE 1999 Siamo in stato di allerta e ci stiamo lavorando molto.

translation.en: But I would say to the American people
translation.it: Ma mi sento di dire agli americani

translation.en: they should go on about their business and celebrate the holidays as they would.
translation.it: di continuare la loro vita normale e di godersi le feste.

translation.en: [anchor] Pentagon officials tell NBC News that at least four US sailors were killed,
translation.it: 2000 - ATTACCATA NAVE USA Il Pentagono ha dichiarato all'NBC che almeno quattro marinai

translation.en: and as many as 30 more wounded
translation.it: sono rimasti uccisi e altri 30 feriti in seguito all'attacco di un kamikaze

translation.en: when a suicide bomber attacked the US Navy Destroyer USS Cole.
translation.it: sono rimasti uccisi e altri 30 feriti in seguito all'attacco di un kamikaze al cacciatorpediniere Cole della Marina USA.

translation.en: [Fallon] A small boat, a skiff,
translation.it: Una piccola barca, un gozzo,

translation.en: with two al-Qaeda members in it, came about midship of the USS Cole,
translation.it: con due membri di al-Qaida a bordo, si avvicinò al centro della USS Cole

translation.en: when it was at a fuel dolphin in Aden, Yemen.
translation.it: mentre faceva rifornimento ad Aden, in Yemen.

translation.en: Midship is about the midway point, which happened to be where the cafeteria was.
translation.it: La parte centrale della nave ospitava per l'appunto la mensa.

translation.en: A huge explosion, it did quite a bit of damage,
translation.it: L'esplosione provocò molti danni

translation.en: and 17 sailors were killed that day in Aden, Yemen.
translation.it: e quel giorno rimasero uccisi 17 marinai ad Aden.

translation.en: The system was already blinking red that summer with threat warnings.
translation.it: In estate c'erano già molte avvisaglie di possibili minacce.

translation.en: We were anticipating some type of attack somewhere.
translation.it: Ci aspettavamo un attacco da qualche parte.

translation.en: We didn't know in what form it would come. We didn't know where it would be.
translation.it: Non sapevamo come sarebbe avvenuto e nemmeno dove.

translation.en: You're getting so much data.
translation.it: Ricevevamo moltissimi dati.

translation.en: So, you know, if you get one thread of intel,
translation.it: Quando arrivano delle informazioni,

translation.en: it could be an anomaly, could be fabricated, could be false, could be some overheard conversation,
translation.it: possono esserci anomalie, notizie false o conversazioni udite per caso,

translation.en: and it might not be validated.
translation.it: quindi possono non essere convalidate.

translation.en: What we were seeing was a tremendous amount of intelligence
translation.it: Ci trovavamo davanti a un'enorme quantità di informazioni

translation.en: that would be indications and warnings that there was something going on.
translation.it: che potevano già indicarci che stava succedendo qualcosa.

translation.en: [Hoffman] In any government, there's always bureaucratic rivalries.
translation.it: In ogni governo ci sono sempre rivalità burocratiche

translation.en: They often have deep historical roots.
translation.it: che spesso hanno radici profonde

translation.en: They're often played out on very personal levels.
translation.it: e si consumano a livelli molto personali.

translation.en: Countering terrorism was something done by a multiplicity of agencies
translation.it: La lotta al terrorismo coinvolgeva molteplici agenzie

translation.en: that did it well,
translation.it: che lavoravano bene,

translation.en: but didn't necessarily feel the need to cooperate with one another.
translation.it: ma non sentivano il bisogno di collaborare.

translation.en: You have to think about the late 1990s in the United States.
translation.it: Pensate alla fine degli anni '90 negli Stati Uniti.

translation.en: We were enmeshed in following every muscle movement
translation.it: Eravamo tutti intenti a seguire ogni dettaglio

translation.en: of the Monica Lewinsky and President Clinton scandal.
translation.it: dello scandalo Lewinsky-Clinton.

translation.en: This was a time when the profound fissures between Republicans and Democrats
translation.it: Era un'era in cui le profonde spaccature tra repubblicani e democratici

translation.en: were developing in many different ways.
translation.it: si stavano evolvendo in modi diversi.

translation.en: So we were very absorbed with what was going on in the United States,
translation.it: Eravamo tutti presi da ciò che succedeva negli USA

translation.en: and oblivious to some of these turf rivalries
translation.it: e ignari di alcune di queste rivalità fra agenzie

translation.en: between agencies or personal enmities between key individuals.
translation.it: e ignari di alcune di queste rivalità fra agenzie o delle inimicizie personali fra personaggi chiave.

translation.en: And all along, you have in the background bin Laden carefully, meticulously,
translation.it: Intanto, sullo sfondo, Bin Laden si muoveva con prudenza, precisione

translation.en: slowly putting together all the pieces
translation.it: e lentezza per rimettere insieme tutti i pezzi

translation.en: to implement what would be a history-changing terrorist operation.
translation.it: e attuare quell'azione terroristica che avrebbe cambiato la storia.

translation.en: [man] We have several situations going on here. It's escalating big-time.
translation.it: Abbiamo varie situazioni in corso e la cosa si fa sempre più grossa.

translation.en: [dispatcher] American dispatch, Jim McDonald.
translation.it: VOCE CENTRALINO AMERICAN AIRLINES Qui Jim McDonald.

translation.en: [man] Indianapolis Center, did you get a hold of American 77?
translation.it: Indianapolis, siete in contatto col volo 77?

translation.en: [dispatcher] No. But we have an unconfirmed report that a second airplane hit the World Trade Center.
translation.it: No. Ma ci è giunta voce che un secondo aereo ha colpito il WTC.

translation.en: You know we lost American 11 to a hijacking?
translation.it: Sapete che il volo 11 è stato dirottato?

translation.en: -[man] American 11? -[dispatcher] Yes. We were hijacked.
translation.it: - Hai detto il volo 11? - Sì. È stato dirottato.

translation.en: It was a Boston-to-LA flight.
translation.it: Era un volo da Boston a LA.

translation.en: And 77 is a Dulles-LA flight.
translation.it: E il 77 è un volo da Dulles a LA.

translation.en: [air traffic controller] American 77 was over… was just west of Charleston, West Virginia.
translation.it: Il volo 77 era a ovest di Charleston, in Virginia Occidentale.

translation.en: We now believe that aircraft may have been hijacked.
translation.it: Crediamo possa essere stato dirottato.

translation.en: [Nasypany] He's heading towards Washington.
translation.it: Si dirige a Washington.

translation.en: Foxy, scramble Langley. Head them towards the Washington area.
translation.it: Langley deve inviare velivoli nell'area di Washington.

translation.en: [man] Roger that.
translation.it: Ricevuto.

translation.en: [man] Indy, Indianapolis Center was working this guy.
translation.it: Se ne stava occupando Indianapolis.

translation.en: [woman] What guy?
translation.it: Di chi?

translation.en: -[air traffic controller] American 77. -[woman] Okay.
translation.it: - Del volo 77. - Ok.

translation.en: [air traffic controller] At flight level three five zero, however, they lost radar with him,
translation.it: A livello 350, però, hanno perso il contatto radar

translation.en: they lost contact with him, they lost everything,
translation.it: e tutti gli altri contatti

translation.en: and they don't have any idea where he is or what happened.
translation.it: e non sanno dove sia finito e cosa sia successo.

translation.en: [man] Our latest report the aircraft VFR six miles southeast of the White House.
translation.it: L'ultimo rapporto lo dava a sei miglia a sud-est della Casa Bianca.

translation.en: [woman] Six miles southeast of the White House?
translation.it: - Sei miglia a sud-est della Casa Bianca? - Sì.

translation.en: [Boston ATC] Yep. East. He's moving away?
translation.it: - Sei miglia a sud-est della Casa Bianca? - Sì. Si allontana?

translation.en: [man] Yep. Aircraft is moving away.
translation.it: Sì. L'aereo si sta allontanando.

translation.en: -[woman] Moving away from the White House? -[man] Yeah.
translation.it: - Dalla Casa Bianca? - Sì.

translation.en: [Nasypany] The White House. Get the fighters there. Jesus, Fox.
translation.it: Vicino alla Casa Bianca. Mandate i caccia. Oddio.

translation.en: [woman] So there were approximately 16 of us in this staff meeting,
translation.it: Eravamo più o meno in 16 in quella riunione

translation.en: and when it got to me,
translation.it: e, quando toccò a me, si sentì il rumore più forte

translation.en: there was the loudest noise I had ever heard.
translation.it: e, quando toccò a me, si sentì il rumore più forte che abbia mai udito.

translation.en: And it got dark.
translation.it: E divenne tutto buio.
